name: Vol 1., Ch.3: The Sleepover Party
description:
Mel and Cat are becoming Tiara’s new best friends. “I have an idea!” says Cat. ”Lets organize a sleepover party at my parent’s place. They will be out of town this weekend, so we can have the house for ourselves!”. Tiara agrees, as she recalls how she has not gone out for weeks. “That sounds lovely! Let’s also invite Anne and Clair! They surely knows how to have a good time!” Mel says, as she retreats jumping around.

Friday night comes and Tiara feels anxious. “Why do I feel this way? Must be the loneliness…” Seconds after she starts to giggle, as she realizes the silliness of her situation. 

As she arrives at Cat’s place Tiara starts feeling more relaxed. Cat has decorated the place with balloons and party perks, and bought a fancy cake for all the girls. “Oh, this is much nicer than I expected!” Tiara says to herself, as she giggles again.
